alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 9:55PM PST until February 23 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 1 AM PST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
